unnormalised: **Gas Cylinder Prices Pinching Pockets - Another Hike!**
normalised: **Gas Cylinder Prices Pinching Pockets - Another Hike!**

unnormalised: Oi, folks! Looks like that delicious Chicken Tikka Masala is going to cost a bit more to cook. Gas cylinder prices have gone up again!
normalised: Oi, folks! Looks like that delicious Chicken Tikka Masala is going to cost a bit more to cook. Gas cylinder prices have gone up again!

unnormalised: Indian Oil Corporation announced a Rs. 50 hike per cylinder, effective immediately. That's on top of the already sky-high prices we saw last month. Households are feeling the pinch, especially after Diwali!
normalised: Indian Oil Corporation announced a rupee fifty hike per cylinder, effective immediately. That's on top of the already sky-high prices we saw last month. Households are feeling the pinch, especially after Diwali!

unnormalised: “It's getting tough to manage the monthly budget,” says Mrs. Sharma from Delhi, a sentiment echoed by many across the nation. "This Diwali cleaning cost me a lot and now this!"
normalised: “It's getting tough to manage the monthly budget,” says Missus Sharma from Delhi, a sentiment echoed by many across the nation. "This Diwali cleaning cost me a lot and now this!"

unnormalised: Experts like Dr. Verma from the Institute of Energy Studies say the rise is due to global crude oil fluctuations and supply chain issues.
normalised: Experts like Doctor Verma from the Institute of Energy Studies say the rise is due to global crude oil fluctuations and supply chain issues.

unnormalised: The subsidy scheme, meant to cushion the blow for poorer families, isn't quite cutting it anymore. Many are considering switching to induction cooktops, even though they require more electricity.
normalised: The subsidy scheme, meant to cushion the blow for poorer families, isn't quite cutting it anymore. Many are considering switching to induction cooktops, even though they require more electricity.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, the "GiveItUp" campaign seems a distant memory now, doesn’t it? Remember when folks were voluntarily giving up their gas subsidies?
normalised: Meanwhile, the "GiveItUp" campaign seems a distant memory now, doesn’t it? Remember when folks were voluntarily giving up their gas subsidies?

unnormalised: Guess we'll all be eating simpler meals for a while. Maybe more Dal and less Paneer Butter Masala? Or perhaps investing in a solar cooker for the balcony of that tiny 500 sq ft apartment? Ugh!
normalised: Guess we'll all be eating simpler meals for a while. Maybe more Dal and less Paneer Butter Masala? Or perhaps investing in a solar cooker for the balcony of that tiny five hundred square feet apartment? Ugh!
